tree.speaker: Soldier
tree.text: I got a report of a Shifter running off in this direction. Do you know anything about it?

tree.speaker: Soldier
tree.text: ...Okay. You better be telling the truth, I'd hate to use the wrath of the Lucosan Royal Guard on you.

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Yeah, no, sorry, I know nothing, heh heh...
